name: Ant Runner
description:
Ant Runner is a game where you play as an ant through an infinite procedurally generated world, avoiding water and shooting at grasshoppers and evil flying mushrooms!

Press space bar to jump and left click/left ctrl to shoot.

Some of the level generation can get a bit buggy and the grasshoppers can get a bit stuck but we couldn't fix it before the jam end :(

Created over 3 days for Ludum Dare 38 - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/ant-runner

Coding by Tom Marsland and Muhammed Tashfiqul Bari
3D models and Graphics by Tom Marsland
Music from stockmusic.com
Sound effects from https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/17256

https://twitter.com/MarsBard_
https://twitter.com/LordTashfiq
